traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the marilith dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The marilith has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Reactive
traits.description: The marilith can take one Reaction on every turn of combat.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The marilith makes six Pact Blade attacks and uses Constrict.

actions.name: Pact Blade
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 17, one Medium or smaller creature the marilith can see within 5 feet. Failure: 15 (2d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. The target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

bonus_actions.name: Teleport
bonus_actions.description: The marilith teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.trigger: The marilith is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon.
reactions.response: The marilith adds 5 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.
